claims.claim: Having a criminal record significantly decreases employment opportunities, even with advanced degrees.
claims.quote: Who's gonna hire me? I have a master's, but that doesn't mean anything if you have this on your record, because what company is gonna take a chance on me?

claims.claim: Personal success stories following incarceration are not the norm due to systemic barriers.
claims.quote: I just feel fortunate that although that happened in my life, it's brought me to where I am now. But not everybody has that.
